short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Online Signature Chrome Extension is a secure and privacy-friendly tool for creating and saving digital signatures.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Online Signature Chrome Extension is a privacy-focused tool that enables users to create and store their digital signatures without risking their personal information. 

Built on React, the extension provides a seamless canvas to draw signatures and copy them to the clipboard for use in any document. 

The extension strictly adheres to privacy policies and does not collect or store user data, ensuring complete safety and confidentiality. In essence, the Online Signature Chrome Extension offers a secure, user-friendly, and hassle-free way to create and save digital signatures online without any privacy concerns.
